dublin_core.dcvalue: Teleconferencing can be used as part of the integrated management of head and neck cancer An audit of the participants views would suggest that the meeting is used in the management of complex head and neck issues
Clinical otolaryngology : official journal of ENT-UK ; official journal of Netherlands Society for Oto-Rhino-Laryngology And Cervico-Facial Surgery
Teleconferencing in the management of head and neck cancer.
